Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self

Great Weapon Master: May make a bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP/May suffer -5 attack w/a heavy weapon to gain +10 damage
One With The Word: May use Reaction to negate damage to self and erase 3d6 spell levels from Awakened Spellbook for 1d6 long rests 1/long rest

Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Song Of Victory: +2 HP melee weapon damage during Bladesong

Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 8 Spell DC: W: 16
Spells:
Arcane Eye (W4 Divi): R30' Self sees w/darkvision through a remote invisible eye that moves 30'/rd for conc up to 1 hr
Banishment (W4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or a demiplane (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Charm Person (W1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Dimension Door (W4 Conj): Self teleports up to 500'; may bring along 1 willing creature
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force and becomes dust if reduced to 0 HP (Dexterity neg); disintegrates large or smaller objects and magical forces [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target becomes dbl size (Adv on Strength, +1d4 HP weapon damage) or half size (Disadv on Strength, -1d4 HP weapon damage) (Constitution neg) for conc up to 1 min
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Gaseous Form (W3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc up to 1 hr
Geas (W5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Grease (W1 Conj): R60' 10' sq becomes difficult terrain and causes creatures to fall prone (Dexterity neg) for 1 min
Invisibility (W2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Major Image (W3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min [+Level extends duration to permanent at level 6]
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Sends target to a labyrinthine demiplane (DC 20 Intelligence escapes) for conc up to 10 min
Mending (W0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear
Mirror Image (W2 Illu): 3 duplicates (AC 10; damage destroys) misdirect attacks on self for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion (W7 Conj): R300' Self and designated creatures may enter an extradimensional dwelling for 1 dy
Otiluke's Freezing Sphere (W6 Evoc): R300' 60' radius inflicts 10d6 HP cold (Constitution half) and freezes water for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Phantom Steed (W3 Illu): R30' Self or target may ride a conjured horse 100'/rd (13 MPH) for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Poison Spray (W0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Prismatic Wall (W9 Abju): R60' 90'x30' area blinds w/in 20' for 1 min (Constitution neg); passers suffer 10d6 HP each fire, acid, lightning, poison, and cold (Dexterity half), restraint (Dexterity neg) and petrification after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg), and blindness (Dexterity neg) and banishment to another plane (Wisdom neg)
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Seeming (W5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Charisma neg; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Creates from snow an obedient, half HP duplicate creature
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: May recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Awakened Spellbook: May perform a ritual casting in normal casting time 1/long rest, use spellbook as a focus, and change spell damage type
Bladesong: +2 Constitution to retain spell concentration in light or no armor and no shield for 1 min 2/short rest
Cantrip Formulas: May replace a W0 cantrip 1/long rest
Manifest Mind: R300' May see w/darkvision, hear, and cast spells 6 times through a ghostly object that emits 10' dim light and moves 30'/rd 1/long rest (may spend a spell slot for additional)
Master Scrivener: R5' After a long rest, may create an enhanced 1st or 2nd level spell scroll from Awakened Spellbook
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Signature Spells: May cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Song Of Defense: During Bladesong, may use Reaction and expend a spell slot to reduce damage to self by 5x slot level
Spell Mastery: May cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
War Caster: Adv on concentration to maintain a spell/May cast when holding a shield and/or weapon/May use Reaction to cast as an OA
Wizardly Quill: May produce multicolored, erasable writing and copy spells at 2 min/level
